tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The most important is the knowledge,  patience and friendliness of the doctor. I was suffering from tremendous pain my tooth and the doctor explained the issue in detail to me. The procedure took around 3 hours but I appreciate the patience and friendliness of the doctor. Eventually I was relieved of the issue and now enjoying my daily life. Thank you Dr Avantika for everything

I had severe pain in my jaw because of my wisdom tooth, I consulted Dr. Avantika Sharma (Dwarka), she clarified everything about the treatment. 
I underwent a painless surgery for extraction of my wisdom tooth done by her. I am extremely satisfied with the treatment. I would definitely recommend her service to everyone.
Awesome Doctor! Great human being!

********* ************ ** *** ********. She very patiently had a look at my son’s (10 years old) paining teeth and suggested extraction since it was infected. The extraction was also done with utmost care and perfection. 

She later on suggested medication and the course of action for next 3 days.

Above all, I really liked the cleanliness and sanitized environment of the clinic especially during Uncertain times.

Greatly recommended.

the doctor is an expert oral maxillofacial surgeon who was referred to me by one of my close friend. It was a pain less experience. I was scared wether I should visit doctor in Corona period however to my dis belief every possible precautionary measures was in place. All instrument were sterilized and packed. And now I got relief from pain which I was carrying for last few months. Truly  a satisfying experience treatment with  graceful demeanor of the doctor.

** ******** ******** ** *** ** *** **** ******* She is completely reliable, friendly, approachable and one can completely trust her. During Covid-19 I had to get my Mother‘s dental surgery done. She is senior citizen and during lockdown was difficult to get her admitted in the hospital for the treatment. She supported us exceptionally during difficult time. She made my mother comfortable through out the process. Most importantly followed complete safety guidelines as per the standards during Covid-19 without any compromise. I will strongly recommend to visit the clinic once without my hesitation and give a chance to serve.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very good behaviour, doctor is very intelligent and panctual. Doctor have good solution for any dental problems.
We often try to choose more experienced doctor but in my experience knowledge is more important and dr Avantika has both

Dr. Avantika was busy in some case, so I was checked by some other doctor. He was good and friendly and explained me about my condition and suggested what needs to be done. I still have to visit for the procedure.
Dr Avantika has explained problem very well and made me understand how to go about implant.Implant was handled very professionally and on time.

I have got my dental implants done from Dr Avantika, I am completely satisfied with the work which has been done. I did not experience any pain during or after the implant surgery. I highly recommend to get treatments with ease.

review: Great experience as a first timer. I barely waited to br helped when I checked in.The staff and doctor was very friendly. I had a great visit and the doctor 's demoanor has really put me at ease so I highly recommed this clinic.
Excellent service from Jr Dental clinic. The doctors were kind and friendly and even ensured I was well informed about my health and care. Highly recommended.

I was given proper advise and medication. The tooth extraction procedure was totally safe, convenient and I have no post procedure complications. The clinic is recommended for dental cases of all ages. Thanks a lot doctor.
Very Very detailed oriented.  Resolved all our concerns.  Suggested every treatment including alternative.  Most importantly, very friendly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Both the doctors are extremely sweet and very descriptive of the issue and the process. They are very welcoming and don't let you stress unnecessarily and counsel you until you understand the issue and have no doubts.

Lastly they carry a constant smile on them which in itself is very calming and shows their confidence throughout the process. A BIG THANKS TO DR. AVANTIKA and PRANSHU.

I would tell one story where I was so reluctant to go for tooth filling process and she made it so easy for me by just speaking all the way in the process and she told me other ways to manage my teeth and gums so that I wouldn’t have to visit her . I have seen her doing so well with the kids even . That was really appreciable . 
Wouldn’t want to go anywhere else than her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: It was a nice experience. The doctor was friendly and very accommodating. Also they stayed true to the appointed time to meet.
Very cordial service. Took personal care. Overall experience is fantastic. Very sympathetic to patients.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was a good experience for me .The Treatment is very nice .I definitely prefer everyone to come to this clinic.

review: Very good experience, we are visiting them from last year yrs for different issues regarding teeth. Always got good treatment and response from her
